item.description:
What happens when you mix a Boston Pub Crawl, a Booze Cruise, and MTV’s Ultimate Cover band? The answer is Boston’s Zoo Cruise N Crawl! Join the Tenon Tours crew on Friday, August 7th for this epic event.

Here’s the 411:
Date: August 7th, 2009
Time: 5:30pm - 1:00am

5:30 PM – 7:30 PM: Exclusive Tenon Tours Pre-Party @ M.J. O’Connor’s Waterfront. Included are FREE APPETIZERS, 1 FREE BEER, and chances to win 1 of 2 $500 FLIGHT VOUCHERS TO IRELAND!* - THIS PRE-PARTY IS SOLD OUT

7:30 PM – 11:00 PM: Crawl over to the World Trade Center and join 800 others as we board the Provincetown II for the Annual Coors Light Zoo Cruise. Included are FREE APPETIZERS, Live Performance by The Zoo, MTV’s Ultimate Cover band!

11:00 PM – 1:00 AM: Hop back onto the mainland and crawl over to The Harp for the After Party. Show your Tenon Tours wristband for express line entry, no cover, and a complimentary beer!

This is a 21+ Event, and proper dress and ID are required. Although the Zoo Cruise capacity is 1000, the Crawl only has 200 spots available. Based on the fact that our St. Patrick’s Day Pre-Party and Pub Crawl sold out within a week, it is imperative that you purchase your tickets early!

Price: $32.00 for Zoo Cruise & After-party only (pre-party sold out)
Click here to pay today:
https://www.paypal.co...

*Flight Giveaway Terms: No purchase necessary. Winner will be chosen from written submitted entries collected at the registration desk. Actual flight including airline, flight number, and times will be chosen by Tenon Tours. Value of the voucher should include base fare and fuel surcharge, but not exceed a retail of $500.00 USD. Flight voucher does not include departures taxes or fees. Prize must be used in conjunction with the purchase of any 7+ night land package offered by Tenon Tours for travel in 2009.
item.how_to_find_us: Present your prepaid ticket at the door
item.name: The Zoo Cruise N' Crawl
